name: Redemption
window: At the start of your turn
windowEffect: You may play 1 event card from your hand.

name: Revelation
permanentEffect: During setup, draw 5 event cards. Add 3 to your hand; shuffle the other 2 back into the deck.

name: Interstellar String Walk
permanentEffect: When you activate a system, apply +1 to the move value of ships that move through a system that contains one of your Command Tokens.

name: Echo of Something
permanentEffect: During your tactical actions, apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships that starts its movement in your home system.

name: Echo of Divergence
permanentEffect: During your tactical actions, apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships that starts its movement in your home system.

name: Echo of Sacrifice
permanentEffect: During your tactical actions, apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships that starts its movement in your home system.

name: Predatory Ambush
permanentEffect: After a player moves ships into a system that contains one of your Command Tokens and your units: Choose up to 2 adjacent systems. Move 1 of your non-fighter ships from each of those systems into the activated system.

name: Strong Webs
permanentEffect: During the status phase, you may choose not to return up to 3 Command Tokens from the board to your reinforcements.

name: Grand Sequence
permanentEffect: When a public objective is revealed, draw one secret objective. You may have any number of scored or unscored secret objectives.

name: Incomprehensible
permanentEffect: You cannot score public objectives. When you would be allowed to score a public objective, you may instead score a secret objective, if you fulfil its requirements.

name: Voidmaker
permanentEffect: Each system that contains no planets and which contains 1 or more of your units gains the PRODUCTION 4 ability as if it were 1 of your units.

name: impairment
permanentEffect: When spending planets for resources, subtract 1 from the value of each planet that you spend.

name: tachyonpulse
permanentEffect: After you activate a system, you may choose to ignore 1 or more anomaly effects during the movement step of this tactical action.

name: Council Patronage
window: At the start of the strategy phase
windowEffect: Replenish your commodities, then gain 1 trade good.

name: Law's Order
window: At the start of any player's turn
windowEffect: You may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity to treat all laws as blank until the end of that turn.

name: The Tribuni
permanentEffect: During setup, choose an unplayed faction from among the Mentak, the Xxcha and The Argent Flight; take that faction's home system, command tokens and control markers. Additionally, take the Keleres Hero that corresponds to that faction
